item.description:
Let's meet in the bar at 9:00pm and mingle!! I can't wait to see everyone out on a Monday night.

Mambo Soul is proud to announce that Mambo Soul Mondays are back this time at the Boyne Pub in Brighton!!

-Lots of parking in two lots (next to the bar and across the street at Mahoney's garden center) and street parking
-Access to the 70 and 86 bus lines, full bar, smooth floor, patio for fresh air, food served until 10pm.
What more could you ask for? Oh right! And DJ Justin will be throwing down the hottest Mambo and Cha Cha Cha you could ask for. Join us for your weekly mambo fix!!

FREE lesson at 9:30pm.
Social dancing until 12:30am.
ONLY $8!!!

https://www.facebook.com/MamboSoulMondays
item.how_to_find_us: 70 Bus from Central, 86 bus from Harvard or Cleveland Circle, plenty of FREE parking! See you right inside the bar :)

group.name: The Boston & Cambridge Salsa Meetup Group

item.name: Salsa Meetup at Mambo Soul Mondays!
